alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 1:55AM CST until January 04 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR NORTHERN AUTAUGA...CHILTON AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 155 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plecher, or 11 miles southwest of Clanton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Deatsville, Maplesville, Billingsley, Vida Junction, Gap Of The Mountain, Parnell, Verbena, Plecher, Marbury, Lay Lake Dam, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Higgins Ferry Park, Pooles Crossroads, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake, Lomax and Stanton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central, south central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
